avg flex per window.info: Average flexible power range per time window

sum of energy per window.info: Total drawn energy per time window

avg standing time.info: Average duration of a single standing event and average total time standing time of all vehicles

standing per window.info: Share of standing time per time window

avg needed energy.info: Average amount of energy needed to reach the desired SoC (averaged over all vehicles and charge events)

power peaks.info: Maximum drawn power, by fixed loads (building, PV), variable loads (charging stations, stationary batteries) and all loads

avg drawn power.info: Drawn power, averaged over all time steps

feed-in energy.info: Total energy from renewable energy sources

stationary battery cycles.info: Number of load cycles of stationary batteries (averaged)

all vehicle battery cycles.info: Number of load cycles per vehicle (averaged)
